text: Mach, haŋonaŋg amɨ amonaŋg omanenta wehɨrɨvar amar. Mbɨ andɨŋ ŋɨmbi ya oram ohɨraŋ mach Yakŋ Ohɨrand marɨvai oramɨŋ hɨrohe andɨŋ orɨndɨramŋgi amar. Amɨ yandɨv wɨram kɨra anɨŋnsar ohɨra osa anchɨnd mach wɨram kɨra anɨŋnsarɨnd, mbɨndɨŋ emansɨŋ aŋkwañɨndɨramŋgɨn amar. Ave amɨ ndɨŋndɨv Yakŋ Ohɨrand ya imbɨr han eŋgwandɨramŋgɨn amar.
